column1: gale ""gene"" collins| gale gene collins age 78 of sidney died wednesday june 10
column2: 2015 at a batesville hospital. he was born august 25
column4: arkansas to luther and lydia collins. he was a carpenter and construction worker and a member of laborers local 159. he attended the sidney baptist church. he was preceded in death by his parents; one son
column8: lloyd collins and charles collins; two sisters
column9: cora lee jones and laura bell marshall and one grandson
column10: jordan lee winningham. survivors include his wife
column11: mary l. collins of the home; twelve sons
column28: illinois and brian k. collins of sidney; four daughters
column32: margaret winningham of sidney and stephanie winningham of decatur
column34: david collins of paragould and walter collins of warrenton
column36: rosa collins of sidney; thirty grandchildren; eighteen great grandchildren; numerous great-great grandchildren; several nieces and nephews and a host of other relatives and friends. funeral services will be sunday
column38: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at the qualls funeral home chapel in cave city with lennie finney officiating. burial will follow in the collins cemetery located at wirth with arrangements by qualls funeral home of cave city. visitation will be sunday
column40: 2015 from 1:00 p. m. until service time at the funeral home. pallbearers will be jordan marshall
column44: colton slayton and walter collins. honorary pallbearers are brian k. collins
